organization.name: Thamizhi
organization.description: A non-profit organization dedicated to promoting Tamil culture, language, and heritage while fostering community engagement and cultural preservation.
organization.mission: To preserve, promote, and celebrate Tamil culture and language through education, community programs, and cultural events.
organization.vision: To be a leading organization in Tamil cultural preservation and community empowerment worldwide.

meta.description: Preserving Tamil heritage through education, cultural programs, and community engagement.
meta.keywords: Tamil culture, Tamil language, Tamil heritage, cultural preservation, community organization
meta.author: Thamizhi Organization

footer.description: Preserving Tamil heritage and empowering communities worldwide through cultural education and community programs.
